content: greetings from the woods of new hampshire this is a fun and easy super long scarf you can crochet with your 12-day yarn advent calendar or any dk wt scraps you have lying around the color changes will be sure to keep your interest and in just a few days you ll have a beautiful colorful scarf to help keep you warm and fashionable materials 12 20 g mini skeins sw merino dk weight yarn various colors 1 skein of contrasting color sw merino dk weight yarn 100 g/245 yds each mini skein section requires approx 18 g/50 yds/46 m of dk wt sw merino yarn and each contrast color section requires approx 9 g/22 yds/20 m of dk wt sw merino yarn *you will need approx 700-800 yds of dk wt yarn to make a scarf *you can also substitute this yarn by holding 2 strands of any fingering wt yarn together hook us 10 5/k/6 5 mm crochet hook gauge 13 double_crochet measured at an angle to match direction of sts + 5 row double_crochet = 4 10 cm on size us 10 5/k/6 5 mm crochet hook blocked finished size 122 /279 cm long x 8 /20 cm wide *want a smaller scarf just use a smaller size crochet hook
